title: Alive Again!
description:
Readings from:
Matthew 28:1-10
Today's passages were read by Thomas Shaheen. Thomas is a native of Maryland and currently resides in Monterey, California where he is pursuing his Master's Degree in Electrical Engineering at the Naval Postgraduate School. He works as an Engineering Duty Officer in the US Navy and enjoys cycling and golfing.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
